sys_template.name: acs_fh_upgrade
sys_template.template:
change_plan=# Run pre-change snapshots:
(echo __CHG_NUMBER__ ; echo 1) | xtp-snap
# Update repos and set upstream repository location:
if ping -c1 172.17.0.10 &> /dev/null ; then echo && echo Maintenance Feed system && cd /usr/local/exegy/puppet/data/ && git reset --hard && git checkout master && git remote set-url origin http://172.17.0.10/git/data.git && git pull && cd /usr/local/exegy/puppet/modules/ && git reset --hard && git checkout master && git remote set-url origin http://172.17.0.10/git/puppet.git && git pull ; else echo && echo XMS system && cd /usr/local/exegy/puppet/data/ && git remote set-url origin http://192.168.101.3/git/data.git && git pull && cd /usr/local/exegy/puppet/modules/ && git remote set-url origin http://192.168.101.3/git/puppet.git && git pull ; fi
# Verify commit has made it to the system:
cd /usr/local/exegy/puppet/data ; git describe --all __COMMIT__
# Backup feedhandler:
\cp -fpv /usr/local/exegy/feedhandlers/lib__FH_NAME__.so /export0/archive/lib__FH_NAME__.so.Pre___CHG_NUMBER__
# Stop exelerate:
if [ `mdc-info -main | grep -c Started` -ne 1 ]; then echo 'mdc-info is not responding, press ENTER to continue or press CTRL+C to exit.'; read; fi echo $HOSTNAME | estop
# Backup persist:
if [ -s /export0/archive/Pre___CHG_NUMBER__.tgz ];then echo "File already exists /export0/archive/Pre___CHG_NUMBER__.tgz"; else tar czvf /export0/archive/Pre___CHG_NUMBER__.tgz /usr/local/exegy/mdc ; fi
# Run puppet:
xpuppet -p
# Start exelerate:
estart^backout_plan=# Stop exelerate:
if [ `mdc-info -main | grep -c Started` -ne 1 ]; then echo 'mdc-info is not responding, press ENTER to continue or press CTRL+C to exit.'; read; fi echo $HOSTNAME | estop
# Restore previous feedhandler:
\cp -fpv /export0/archive/__FH_NAME__.so.Pre___CHG_NUMBER__ /usr/local/exegy/feedhandlers/__FH_NAME__.so
# Start exelerate:
estart
# Run snapshots to verify no changes made:
(echo __CHG_NUMBER__ ; echo 2) | xtp-snap^u_validation_plan=# Run snapshots to verify changes made:
(echo __CHG_NUMBER__ ; echo 2) | xtp-snap
# Verify feedhandler version:
mdc-info -lines -full | grep -A1 __FH_NAME__ | grep 'Handler Ver:' | uniq | grep -c __VERSION__^short_description=ACS change for __FH_NAME__ __VERSION__^u_business_objective=To install or update __FH_NAME__ to version __VERSION__^assignment_group=0148f7bb6fb7a100b13653a11c3ee41d^u_category=629a2f626f3835005318eef11c3ee42d^state=13^reason=^description=ACS change for __FH_NAME__ __VERSION__^u_expedited=false^u_expedite_justification=^u_workflow_state=exec_approval^EQ
